attributes.action: In another EU referendum there should be the option to deselect your local MP
attributes.background: We need the option to deselect MPs in constituency's that don't respect the result of the referendum result. If we had MPs that believed in democracy and the voice of their constituency then we would have been able to move forward to break the impasse in parliament.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Selecting candidates in a constituency is the responsibility of political parties, not the UK Government and Parliament. 

If you'd like a general election, you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
